blocks.name: 0evenALTV
blocks.content: 0 is an even number. (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 17-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: 0noddALTV
blocks.content: 0 is not an odd number. (Contributed by AV, 3-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 17-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: 1oddALTV
blocks.content: 1 is an odd number. (Contributed by AV, 3-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: 1nevenALTV
blocks.content: 1 is not an even number. (Contributed by AV, 12-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: 2evenALTV
blocks.content: 2 is an even number. (Contributed by AV, 12-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: 2noddALTV
blocks.content: 2 is not an odd number. (Contributed by AV, 3-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: nn0o1gt2ALTV
blocks.content: An odd nonnegative integer is either 1 or greater than 2. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jun-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0o1gt2ALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd)), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2))))
  elnn1uz2(c0)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))))
  a1d(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
  orc(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)))
  eluz1i(c0, nat2)
  2z()
  imp(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wo(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wceq(nat2, c0)))
  leloed(nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  zre(c0)
  jaoi(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wceq(nat2, c0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))))
  a1d(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
  olc(wbr(nat2, clt, c0), wceq(c0, nat1))
  syl6bi(wceq(nat2, c0), wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wcel(nat2, codd))
  eqcoms(nat2, c0, wb(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(nat2, codd)))
  eleq1(c0, nat2, codd)
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(nat2, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wnel(nat2, codd))
  2noddALTV()
  sylbi(wnel(nat2, codd), wi(wcel(nat2, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wn(wcel(nat2, codd)))
  df-nel(nat2, codd)
  pm2.21(wcel(nat2, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, codd))
  eleq1(c0, nat0, codd)
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(nat0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wnel(nat0, codd))
  0noddALTV()
  sylbi(wnel(nat0, codd), wi(wcel(nat0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0))), wn(wcel(nat0, codd)))
  df-nel(nat0, codd)
  pm2.21(wcel(nat0, codd), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wbr(nat2, clt, c0)))
}

blocks.name: nnoALTV
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of an odd number greater than 1. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jun-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnoALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  oddm1div2z(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  eluz2b1(c0)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  posdifd(nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  1red(wcel(c0, cz))
  zre(c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  3jca(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  zred(co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  peano2zm(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  gt0div(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2)
  elnnz(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: nn0oALTV
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of an odd nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0oALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  oddm1div2z(c0)
  imp(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wi(wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))))
  a1d(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  nnm1ge0(c0)
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  peano2rem(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  ge0div(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2)
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(nat0, codd))
  eleq1(c0, nat0, codd)
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(nat0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))), wnel(nat0, codd))
  0noddALTV()
  sylbi(wnel(nat0, codd), wi(wcel(nat0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))), wn(wcel(nat0, codd)))
  df-nel(nat0, codd)
  pm2.21(wcel(nat0, codd), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  elnn0z(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: nn0e
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of an even nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 22-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0e(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  anim12ci(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  nn0ge0(c0)
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  nn0re(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  ge0div(c0, nat2)
  evendiv2z(c0)
  elnn0z(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: nneven
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of an even positive integer. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nneven(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  anim12ci(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  divgt0d(c0, nat2, wcel(c0, cn))
  nnre(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  nngt0(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  evendiv2z(c0)
  elnnz(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nneven(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c0 ∈ Even)→(c0[÷]2)∈ ℕ)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c0 ∈ Even), (c0[÷]2)∈ ℕ, ((c0[÷]2)∈ ℤ ∧ 0[<](c0[÷]2)))
  anim12ci(c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ Even, (c0[÷]2)∈ ℤ, 0[<](c0[÷]2))
  divgt0d(c0, nat2, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnre(c0)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, 2 ∈ ℝ)
  2re()
  nngt0(c0)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, 0[<]2)
  2pos()
  evendiv2z(c0)
  elnnz((c0[÷]2))
}

blocks.name: nn0onn0exALTV
blocks.content: For each odd nonnegative integer there is a nonnegative integer which, multiplied by 2 and increased by 1, results in the odd nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.) (Revised by AV, 22-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0onn0exALTV(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syldan(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, codd), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  nn0oALTV(c0)
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)))
  eqtr2d(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  divcan2d(nat2, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  peano2cnm(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  nn0cn(c0)
  npcan1(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nn0enn0exALTV
blocks.content: For each even nonnegative integer there is a nonnegative integer which, multiplied by 2, results in the even nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.) (Revised by AV, 22-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0enn0exALTV(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven)), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  nn0e(c0)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  nn0cn(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, ceven))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ceven)
  diff.ceven.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn0enn0exALTV(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0 ∈ Even)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 =(2[×]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, (c0[÷]2), (c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0 ∈ Even), c0 =(2[×]s0), c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  nn0e(c0)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c0 ∈ Even), s0 =(c0[÷]2), (c0 =(2[×]s0)↔ c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, (2[×]s0), (2[×](c0[÷]2)), s0 =(c0[÷]2))
  oveq2(s0, (c0[÷]2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ Even, c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  syl3anc(c0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)), c0 ∈ ℂ, 2 ∈ ℂ, 2 ≠ 0)
  nn0cn(c0)
  2cnd(c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ0, 2 ≠ 0)
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, (2[×](c0[÷]2)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ 2 ∈ ℂ ∧ 2 ≠ 0))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ Even)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ceven)
  diff.ceven.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, (2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, (c0[÷]2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnennexALTV
blocks.content: For each even positive integer there is a positive integer which, multiplied by 2, results in the even positive integer. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnennexALTV(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven)), wrex(s0, cn, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven)), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  nneven(c0)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  nncn(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, ceven))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ceven)
  diff.ceven.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnennexALTV(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c0 ∈ Even)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(2[×]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn, (c0[÷]2), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c0 ∈ Even), c0 =(2[×]s0), c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  nneven(c0)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c0 ∈ Even), s0 =(c0[÷]2), (c0 =(2[×]s0)↔ c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, (2[×]s0), (2[×](c0[÷]2)), s0 =(c0[÷]2))
  oveq2(s0, (c0[÷]2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ Even, c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  syl3anc(c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(2[×](c0[÷]2)), c0 ∈ ℂ, 2 ∈ ℂ, 2 ≠ 0)
  nncn(c0)
  2cnd(c0 ∈ ℕ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, 2 ≠ 0)
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, (2[×](c0[÷]2)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ 2 ∈ ℂ ∧ 2 ≠ 0))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ Even)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ceven)
  diff.ceven.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, (2[×](c0[÷]2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, (c0[÷]2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnpw2evenALTV
blocks.content: 2 to the power of a positive integer is even. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jun-2020.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)
